description: Dashboard completo para monitoriza√ß√£o Cantolico - Logs, Performance, User Activity, Security

panels.description: Total Count of log lines in the specified time range

targets.expr:
sum(count_over_time(({app="cantolico"}
| json
| environment=~"$environment"
| level=~"$level"
| category=~"$category"
|= "$user_id"
|= "$song_id"
|= "$playlist_id"
|= "$submission_id"
|= "$request_id"
|= "$correlation_id"
|= "$tags")[$__interval]))

panels.title: Total Count of logs

panels.description: Total Count of $searchable_pattern in the specified time range

targets.expr:
sum(count_over_time(({app="cantolico"}
| json
| environment=~"$environment"
| level=~"$level"
| category=~"$category"
|= "$user_id"
|= "$song_id"
|= "$playlist_id"
|= "$submission_id"
|= "$request_id"
|= "$correlation_id"
|= "$tags"
|~ "(?i)$searchable_pattern")[$__interval]))

panels.title: Total Count of $searchable_pattern

targets.expr:
sum(count_over_time(({app="cantolico"}
| json
| environment=~"$environment"
| level=~"$level"
| category=~"$category"
|= "$user_id"
|= "$song_id"
|= "$playlist_id"
|= "$submission_id"
|= "$request_id"
|= "$correlation_id"
|= "$tags"
| level="error")[$__interval]))
count(count by (user_user_id) (rate({app="cantolico"} | json | user_user_id != "" [5m])))

panels.description: Live logs is like 'tail -f' in real time

targets.expr:
{app="cantolico"}
| json
| environment=~"$environment"
| level=~"$level"
| category=~"$category"
|= "$user_id"
|= "$song_id"
|= "$playlist_id"
|= "$submission_id"
|= "$request_id"
|= "$correlation_id"
|= "$tags"
|~ "(?i)$searchable_pattern"
| line_format "{{ .level }} | {{ .category }} | user={{ .user_user_id }} ({{ .user_user_email }}) | IP={{ .network_ip_address }} | song={{ .domain_song_id }} | {{ .message }}"

panels.title: Live logs

targets.expr: sum by (category) (count_over_time({app="cantolico"} | json | category="user_action" [$__interval]))
sum by (level) (count_over_time({app="cantolico"} | json | category="auth" [$__interval]))
topk(10, sum by (user_user_email) (count_over_time({app="cantolico"} | json | user_user_email != "" [$__range])))
topk(20, sum by (network_ip_address, user_user_email) (count_over_time({app="cantolico"} | json | category="auth" | level="error" [$__range])))
avg_over_time({app="cantolico"} | json | category="http" | http_response_time_ms != "" | unwrap http_response_time_ms [$__interval])
sum by (http_status_code) (count_over_time({app="cantolico"} | json | category="http" | http_status_code != "" [$__interval]))
topk(20, avg by (http_method, http_path) (avg_over_time({app="cantolico"} | json | category="http" | http_response_time_ms != "" | unwrap http_response_time_ms [$__range])))
sum by (category) (count_over_time({app="cantolico"} | json | level="error" [$__interval]))
{app="cantolico"} | json | level="error" | line_format "{{.message}}"
{app="cantolico"} | json | message=~"(?i)(ban|suspend|warn|moderat)" | line_format "{{.timestamp}} | {{.user_user_email}} | {{.message}}"
topk(15, sum by (network_ip_address) (count_over_time({app="cantolico"} | json | network_ip_address != "" [$__range])))

sum(count_over_time(({app="cantolico"}
| json
| environment=~"$environment"
| level=~"$level"
| category=~"$category"
|= "$user_id"
|= "$song_id"
|= "$playlist_id"
|= "$submission_id"
|= "$request_id"
|= "$correlation_id"
|= "$tags")[$__interval])) by (stream)

panels.title: Total count of stderr / stdout pie

targets.expr:
sum(count_over_time(({app="cantolico"}
| json
| environment=~"$environment"
| level=~"$level"
| category=~"$category"
|= "$user_id"
|= "$song_id"
|= "$playlist_id"
|= "$submission_id"
|= "$request_id"
|= "$correlation_id"
|= "$tags"
|~ "(?i)$searchable_pattern")[$__interval])) by (level)

sum(count_over_time(({app="cantolico"}
| json
| environment=~"$environment"
| level=~"$level"
| category=~"$category"
|= "$user_id"
|= "$song_id"
|= "$playlist_id"
|= "$submission_id"
|= "$request_id"
|= "$correlation_id"
|= "$tags"
|~ "(?i)$searchable_pattern")[$__interval])) * 100 / sum(count_over_time(({app="cantolico"}
| json
| environment=~"$environment"
| level=~"$level"
| category=~"$category"
|= "$user_id"
|= "$song_id"
|= "$playlist_id"
|= "$submission_id"
|= "$request_id"
|= "$correlation_id"
|= "$tags")[$__interval]))

sum(count_over_time(({app="cantolico"}
| json
| environment=~"$environment"
| level=~"$level"
| category=~"$category"
|= "$user_id"
|= "$song_id"
|= "$playlist_id"
|= "$submission_id"
|= "$request_id"
|= "$correlation_id"
|= "$tags"
|~ "(?i)$searchable_pattern")[$__interval])) by (level)

sum(rate(({app="cantolico"}
| json
| environment=~"$environment"
| level=~"$level"
| category=~"$category"
|= "$user_id"
|= "$song_id"
|= "$playlist_id"
|= "$submission_id"
|= "$request_id"
|= "$correlation_id"
|= "$tags"
|~ "(?i)$searchable_pattern")[30s])) by (level)

sum(count_over_time(({app="cantolico"}
| json
| environment=~"$environment"
| level=~"$level"
| category=~"$category"
|= "$user_id"
|= "$song_id"
|= "$playlist_id"
|= "$submission_id"
|= "$request_id"
|= "$correlation_id"
|= "$tags")[$__interval])) by (stream)

list.description: Regex para environment (ex: production|development, ou .* para todos)
list.label: Environment
list.name: environment

list.description: Regex para level (ex: info|error|warn, ou .* para todos)
list.label: Level
list.name: level

list.description: Regex para category (ex: user|system|performance, ou .* para todos)
list.label: Category
list.name: category

title: cantolico
